title: SuperAGI â€” AI Tool Review
description: SuperAGI is an open-source multi-agent framework with a visual UI for orchestrating autonomous AI agents with tools, memory, and marketplace skills. SuperAGI is an open-source autonomous AI agent framework with a graphical interface for creating, managing, and running AI agents. It supports multiple parallel agents, a marketplace of agent tools, vector memory, and integrations with various LLMs including GPT-4, Claude, and open-source models. Highlights: Visual agent management UI. Multi-agent parallel support. Tool marketplace. Vector memory integration. Multiple LLM support.
